instructor.name: Yaïr Knijn
instructor.title: Principal Cloud Architect & Engineer
instructor.bio: Microsoft Certified Trainer (MCT) with extensive experience in Azure architecture and enterprise cloud solutions. Specialized in designing scalable, secure, and cost-effective cloud infrastructures.

personalStory.story: As a Principal Cloud Architect, I've designed and implemented Azure solutions for organizations ranging from startups to Fortune 500 companies. One of my most rewarding projects involved migrating a global enterprise's entire infrastructure to Azure, resulting in 40% cost savings and 99.99% uptime. In this training, I'll share the real-world architectural patterns and best practices that have proven successful across hundreds of Azure implementations.
